concept.title: What is a Spotify Jam?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what a Spotify jam is.

conbody.p: It is a personalized real-time listening session for your group to collaborate on what you're listening to. Jam allows Premium suscribers to invite others to add songs to a shared queue. Everyone in the Jam can add songs, see who added which song, and receive recommendations, all from their own devices.
